title: Loans from Domestic Banks for the Rehabilitation and Improvements to the Sections of the following Roads  on priority basis
decision_details:
- the proposals made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Finance and Planning, to authorize the Road Development Authority to enter into loan agreements with a State Bank to obtain loans for the rehabilitation and improvements to the following road sections, were approved by the Cabinet:

* Thaldoowa - Meewitigammana Road (B408) - from 0 km to 17.30 km; and 

* Kurunegala - Narammala - Madampe Road - from 40.87 km to 64.77 km.
